meanings.sent1: She was unthrifty with her money, always buying things she didn't need.
meanings.sent2: The unthrifty shopper spent all her savings on unnecessary items.
meanings.sent3: His unthrifty spending habits left him with empty pockets and a full closet.
meanings.sent4: The unthrifty habits of the government led to a huge budget deficit.
meanings.sent5: The unthrifty use of resources resulted in environmental damage.

meanings.sent1: The unthrifty student always bought expensive school supplies.
meanings.sent2: Her unthrifty ways left her struggling to make ends meet.
meanings.sent3: The unthrifty chef used only the most expensive ingredients in his dishes.
meanings.sent4: The unthrifty lifestyle led to constant financial difficulties.
meanings.sent5: The unthrifty habits drained her bank account quickly.

meanings.definition: Not prospering or thriving; unsuccessful or unproductive.
meanings.sent1: The unthrifty business failed to attract customers.
meanings.sent2: His unthrifty investments never yielded any returns.
meanings.sent3: The unthrifty plant withered away due to neglect.
meanings.sent4: The unthrifty project was abandoned halfway through.
meanings.sent5: The unthrifty artist struggled to sell any of his paintings.
